description: (# 1's)-(# 0's) in first n terms of A003137.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a030339 n = a030339_list !! (n-1)a030339_list = scanl1   (\u v -> u + fromEnum (v == 1) - fromEnum (v == 0)) a003137_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 21 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
